Function Documentation

static void CSL_wdtEmuModeEnable ( CSL_wdtHandle  hWdt,
Uint32  enableEmuMode 
)
inlinestatic

============================================================================
CSL_wdtEmuModeEnable

Description
This API enable/disable emulation mode of WDT.

Arguments 

       hWdt              The handle of the WDT module.
       enableEmuMode     Enable/disable the emulation mode.
                         enableEmuMode will take the following values.
                             -# TRUE - Enable emulation mode.
                             -# FALSE - Disable emulation mode.

Return Value
None

Pre Condition
None

Post Condition
None

Example 

     CSL_wdtEmuModeEnable(hWdt, enableEmuMode); // Enable/Disable emulation
static void CSL_wdtEnable ( CSL_wdtHandle  hWdt,
Uint32  enableWdt 
)
inlinestatic

============================================================================
CSL_wdtEnable

Description
This API shall enable(start)/disable(stop) the WDT.

Arguments 

       hWdt                The handle of the WDT module.

Return Value
None

Pre Condition
None

Post Condition
None

Example 

     CSL_wdtEnable(hWdt, enableWdt); // Enable the MMU

static void CSL_wdtIntrClear ( CSL_wdtHandle  hWdt,
CSL_wdtIntrMask  intrMask 
)
inlinestatic

============================================================================
CSL_wdtIntrClear

Description
This API clears the WDT interrupts.

Arguments 

       hWdt           The handle of the WDT module.
       intrMask       Interrupts to be triggered. intrMask will contain
                      values from the following enum.
                         -#CSL_wdtIntrMask

Return Value
None

Pre Condition
None

Post Condition
None

Example 

     CSL_wdtIntrClear(hWdt, intrMask); // Clear interrupt status
static void CSL_wdtIntrDisable ( CSL_wdtHandle  hWdt,
CSL_wdtIntrMask  intrMask 
)
inlinestatic

============================================================================
CSL_wdtIntrDisable

Description
This API disables the WDT interrupts.

Arguments 

       hWdt           The handle of the WDT module.
       intrMask       Interrupts to be triggered. intrMask will contain
                      values from the following enum.
                         -#CSL_wdtIntrMask

Return Value
None

Pre Condition
None

Post Condition
None

Example 

     CSL_wdtIntrDisable(hWdt, intrMask); // Disable interrupt

                         -#CSL_wdtIntrMask

None

None

Post Condition
None

Example

CSL_wdtIntrMask  intrMask 
)
inlinestatic

============================================================================
CSL_wdtIntrTrigger

Description
This API triggers an interrupt request for the specified event.

Arguments 

       hWdt           The handle of the WDT module.
       intrMask       Interrupts to be triggered. intrMask will contain
                      values from the following enum.
                         -#CSL_wdtIntrMask

Return Value
None

Pre Condition
None

Post Condition
None

Example 

     CSL_wdtIntrTrigger(hWdt, intrMask); // Triggers an interrupt request

CSL_wdtPrescalerClkDisable

Description
This API shall disable the WDT prescaler clock.

Arguments 

       hWdt                The handle of the WDT module.

Return Value
None

Pre Condition
None

Post Condition
None

Example 

     CSL_wdtPrescalerClkDisable(hWdt); // Enable the MMU

inlinestatic

============================================================================
CSL_wdtReset

Description
This API shall perform a soft reset of the WDT.

Arguments 

       hWdt                The handle of the WDT module.

Return Value
None

Pre Condition
None

Post Condition
None

Example 

     CSL_wdtReset(hWdt); // Enable the MMU
static void CSL_wdtSetCounter ( CSL_wdtHandle  hWdt,
Uint32  cntrVal 
)
inlinestatic

============================================================================
CSL_wdtSetCounter

Description
Set the WDT counter value. When the WDT is started/enabled the count will start from the current value present in the counter. This API shall program the counter value.

Arguments 

       hWdt                The handle of the WDT module.

Return Value
None

Pre Condition
None

Post Condition
None

Example 

     CSL_wdtSetCounter(hWdt, cntrVal); // Enable the MMU
static void CSL_wdtSetDelayVal ( CSL_wdtHandle  hWdt,
Uint32  delayVal 
)
inlinestatic

============================================================================
CSL_wdtSetDelayVal

Description
This API sets the WDT delay value.

Arguments 

       hWdt             The handle of the WDT module.
       delayVal         Delay value to be programmed.

Return Value
None

Pre Condition
None

Post Condition
None

Example 

     CSL_wdtSetDelayVal(hWdt, delayVal); // Sets the WDT delay value
static void CSL_wdtSetIdleMode ( CSL_wdtHandle  hWdt,
CSL_wdtIdleMode  idleMode 
)
inlinestatic

============================================================================
CSL_wdtSetIdleMode

Description
This API configures one of the idle modes.

Arguments 

       hWdt             The handle of the WDT module.
       idleMode         Value to determine idle mode selection idleMode can
                        take macros from the following enum
                         - #CSL_wdtIdleMode

Return Value
None

Pre Condition
None

Post Condition
None

Example 

     CSL_wdtSetIdleMode(hWdt, idleMode); // Configure idle mode
static void CSL_wdtSetReloadVal ( CSL_wdtHandle  hWdt,
Uint32  reloadVal 
)
inlinestatic

============================================================================
CSL_wdtSetReloadVal

Description
This function is used to enable the MMU.

Arguments 

       hWdt                The handle of the WDT module.
       reloadVal           WDT reload value.

Return Value
None

Pre Condition
None

Post Condition
None

Example 

     CSL_wdtSetReloadVal(hWdt, reloadVal); // Enable the MMU
static void CSL_wdtTriggerReload ( CSL_wdtHandle  hWdt,
Uint32  trigVal 
)
inlinestatic

============================================================================
CSL_wdtTriggerReload

Description
This API enables the trigger feature of WDT.

Arguments 

       hWdt              The handle of the WDT module.
       trigVal           Trigger value to be programmed.

Return Value
None

Pre Condition
None

Post Condition
None

Example 

     CSL_wdtTriggerReload(hWdt, trigVal); // Enable trigger
